content:
General Instructions :
Good morning. My name is ____ and I live in _____. Iâ€™d like to tell you a little bit about myself. [Number and ages of children; pets; sports; etc]. Could you tell me a little about yourself and your family?
[Wait for response; if student is reluctant, ask next question, but if they seem comfortable continue to verbal consent].
What do you like to do when you are not in school?
